    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        @GetMapping(value="/getUser")
public java.lang.String getUser(@RequestParam
                                                               java.lang.String userName)
        Read - Get the personal information of a registered user, displaying its userName, its phoneNumber and its emailAddress
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user whose personal information are sought
        Returns:
        JSon file containing user's information or an error message if the user is not found

      • createUser

        @PostMapping(value="/createUser")
public java.lang.String createUser(@RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String userName,
                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                      java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                      java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Create - Add a new user from the information given in parameter
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user to create
        phoneNumber - not required - the phone number of the user to create
        emailAddress - not required - the email address of the user to create
        Returns:
        a success message to indicate the user have been created or an error message if it couldn't have been done

      • updateUser

        @PutMapping(value="/updateUser")
public java.lang.String updateUser(@RequestParam
                                                                     java.lang.String userName,
                                                                     @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                     java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                                                     @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                     java.lang.String emailAddress)
        Update - Update a user from the information given in parameter
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user to update
        phoneNumber - not required - the new phone number to update
        emailAddress - not required - the new email address to update
        Returns:
        a success message to indicate the user have been updated or an error message if it couldn't have been done

      • deleteUser

        @DeleteMapping(value="/deleteUser")
public java.lang.String deleteUser(@RequestParam
                                                                        java.lang.String userName)
        Delete - Delete a user
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user to delete
        Returns:
        a success message to indicate the user have been deleted or an error message if it couldn't have been done

      • getUserPreferences

        @GetMapping(value="/getUserPreferences")
public java.lang.String getUserPreferences(@RequestParam
                                                                                     java.lang.String userName)
        Read - Get the user preferences of a registered user. The userPreferences object contains the currency the user wants to use, the minimal and the maximal price he wants to pay, the trip duration (in number of days), the number of adults and children and the number of tickets
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user whose preferences are sought
        Returns:
        JSon file containing user preferences' information or an error message if the user is not found

      • updateUserPreferences

        @PutMapping(value="/updateUserPreferences")
public java.lang.String updateUserPreferences(@RequestParam
                                                                                           java.lang.String userName,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer attractionProximity,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.String currency,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer lowerPricePoint,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer highPricePoint,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer tripDuration,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer ticketQuantity,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer numberOfAdults,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                                           java.lang.Integer numberOfChildren)
        Update - Update user preferences from the information given in parameter
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of the user whose preferences are to be updated
        attractionProximity - not required - the new preferred distance between user and attraction
        currency - not required - the new currency the user wants to use to pay trips
        lowerPricePoint - not required - the new minimal price the user wants for its trips
        highPricePoint - not required - the new maximal price the user wants for its trips
        tripDuration - not required - the new duration (in number of days) the user wants for its trips
        numberOfAdults - not required - the new number of adults the user wants for its trips
        numberOfChildren - not required - the new number of children the user wants for its trips
        ticketQuantity - not required - the new quantity of tickets the user wants for the attractions
        Returns:
        a success message to indicate the user have been updated or an error message if it couldn't have been done
